description: The Local Weather REST API (also called City and Town Weather API) method allows you to access current weather conditions, the next 14 days of accurate and reliable weather forecast, Air Quality Data, Weather Alerts and Monthly Climate Averages for over 4 million cities and towns worldwide. The Local Weather API returns weather elements such as temperature, precipitation (rainfall), weather description, weather icon, wind speed, etc.
name: world_weather_online_api_local_weather_api

description: Premier weather intelligence API delivering the most comprehensive and reliable meteorological data available. Provides industry-leading accuracy for current conditions, 14-day forecasts, real-time air quality monitoring, and critical weather alerts across 4+ million global locations. Essential for applications requiring precise environmental awareness and risk mitigation.

description: Retrieve structured weather data through precise parameter-based queries. Accepts location (q), time period (tp), air quality (aqi), alerts, and forecast duration (num_of_days) parameters. Returns comprehensive JSON-formatted data including current conditions, multi-day forecasts, temperature, precipitation, UV index, and severe weather alerts with industry-leading accuracy.
name: weather_data_api
